location.sjis: プロスバンの町 駅

portrait_l.name: man
portrait_l.sjis: ねぇキミはどっちかって言うと 攻撃系？回復系？
portrait_l.ascii: Hey, if you had to choose between Attack-type or Heal-type, which one would you pick?

portrait_l.name: man
portrait_l.sjis: ん？ ああ、召喚獣を呼ぶ戦略として 主にどちらを優先してるかって話
portrait_l.ascii: Hm? Oh, I'm talking about what kind of Summon Beasts you prefer.

portrait_l.name: man
portrait_l.sjis: ボクの場合は、いやし系だね ああ、いやされるよミョータロウ
portrait_l.ascii: In my case, it'd pick Heal-type. Ahh, that's so relaxing, Myoutarou.

sjis.end_line: 福引き券のご利用は計画的に！

ascii.end_line: Use of the lottery should follow procedure!
